about_the_game:
Bulken is a rogue-like action-RPG where you find yourself on a gigantic derelict spaceship filled with lurking monsters. Each run is a new challenge as the monsters mutate randomly on each semi-procedural deck. Can you reach the Bridge and take control of Bulken?

Bulken puts emphasis on survival and keeping the player engaged moment to moment with some new twists to the genre.

  • Take control of rooms with different functionality and use them as safe areas to plot your next move.

  • Discover the different mutations that can imbue the monsters with special abilities and resistances.

  • Scan your environment to identify threats as well as items and objects.

  • Upgrade your character and weapons as you discover blueprints for crafting and levels up.

  • Use the environment to deal with enemies: Break windows to suck enemies into space or shoot open a pipe to expose them to toxic gas etc.

Note that this game is still very much in development and some assets are placeholder and/or unfinished.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contain exaggerated sci-fi violence not appropriate for all ages.
